title: Cross Chain Proposal #4.1 Presale
body:
## Should we crowdpool on Dodo?

There are not too many options where we could host our initial farm offering (IFO), but we do have a presale platform available, and that is using Dodo's bond-curve crowdpooling feature.

Put it simply, you put in your USDC or ETH, and at the end of the presale, you claim your farm tokens. The bond-curve makes it so the earlier you get in, the better price you get. If you remove your position, you go to the back of the line if you want in again.

[Click here to learn more about Dodo's crowdpooling feature.](https://dodoex.github.io/docs/docs/crowdPooling/)

Vote simply yes if you approve and no if you have a better idea and wish to explain it in the comments.

***Vote wisely ;)***
choices: No. I have a better idea.
author: 0x3ACC73A5E87c24CDe92c69a52a9db9f5EE55294B
